haptic¶

class haptic.HapticDevice(id_=0, dev=None)¶

Manage calibration and use of a haptic device.

Attributes:

_device (evdev.InputDevice) the input device in use strongMagnitude (hexadecimal) vibration strength for the strong motor weakMAgnitude (hexadecimal) vibration strength for the weak motor

calibrateRumble(sMag=0, wMag=65520)¶

Interactive calibration of vibration strength

The vibration strength starts at wMag and ticks down by 0x0f00 until the user presses the south button on the controller (e.g., x on dualshock). Pressing the east button progresses the calibration.

calibrateStick(win)¶

Move stick, release, then press West

getAllAxes()¶

Get a list of all current axis values.

getHat(n)¶

Get the position of a particular hat.

The position returned is an (x, y) tuple where x and y can be -1, 0 or +1

rumble(repeat=1)¶

Cause the device to rumble.

Keyword arguments:

repeat (int) How long the device should rumble for, in seconds
